view:properties.cm:name: Reports
view:properties.cm:title: Reports
view:properties.cm:description: Record series for reports

view:properties.cm:name: AIS Audit Records
view:properties.cm:title: AIS Audit Records
view:properties.cm:description: Consisting of AIS Security Officer or Terminal Area Security Officer weekly audit records of audit actions performed on all AIS as required by applicable policy which are maintained by any JS/combatant command activity.

view:properties.rma:dispositionInstructions: Cut off monthly, hold 1 month, then destroy.

view:properties.cm:name: Unit Manning Documents
view:properties.cm:title: Unit Manning Documents
view:properties.cm:description: Consisting of manpower document and monthly strength report forwarded to OSD and other activities which are maintained by personnel office as the official record copy.

view:properties.rma:dispositionInstructions: Cut off every 3 months, hold 3 months, then destroy.

view:properties.cm:name: Overtime Reports
view:properties.cm:title: Overtime reports and related documents
view:properties.cm:description: Overtime reports and related documents which are maintained by JS/combatant controller as the official record copy.

view:properties.rma:dispositionInstructions: Cut off at end of FY, hold 3 years, then destroy.

view:properties.cm:name: Bi-Weekly Cost Reports
view:properties.cm:title: Bi-Weekly Cost Reports
view:properties.cm:description: Bi-wekly cost reports which are maintained by JS/combatant command controler as the official record copy.

view:properties.rma:dispositionInstructions: Cut off at end of CY, hold 2 years, then destroy.

view:properties.cm:name: Military Files
view:properties.cm:title: Military Files
view:properties.cm:description: Record series for military files

view:properties.cm:name: Military Assignment Documents
view:properties.cm:title: Military Assignment Documents
view:properties.cm:description: Policy matters pertaining to military assignments which are maintained by any JS/combatant command activity as the official record copy.

view:properties.rma:dispositionInstructions: Cut off when superseded, hold 5 years, then destroy.

rma:recordCategory.view:childName: cm:Official Military Personnel Privilege Card Applications

view:properties.cm:name: Official Military Personnel Privilege Card Applications
view:properties.cm:title: Official Military Personnel Privilege Card Applications
view:properties.cm:description: Consisting of: documents reflecting applications for priviege cards and ration cards, including Department of Defense Forms (DD Forms) 1172 (Application for Unifomed Services Identification and Privilege Card) and similar documents which are maintained by any JS/combatant command activity.

view:properties.rma:dispositionInstructions: Cut off when no longer needed and destroy immediately.

view:properties.cm:name: Personnel Security Program Records
view:properties.cm:title: Personnel Security Program Records
view:properties.cm:description: Position sensitivity files including requests for information relating to the designation of sensitive and non-sensitive personnel positions in an agency and results of final actions taken consisting of approved requests which are maintained by any JS/combatant command activity

view:properties.rma:dispositionInstructions: Cutoff when position is abolished, re-designated, or no longer needed, whichever is later. Destroy immediately after cutoff.

view:properties.cm:name: Civilian Files
view:properties.cm:title: Civilian Files
view:properties.cm:description: Record series for civilian files

view:properties.cm:name: Employee Performance File System Records
view:properties.cm:title: Employee Performance File System Records
view:properties.cm:description: Consisting of: performance records superseded through an administrative, judicial, or quasi-judicial procedure which are maintained by any JS/combatant command activity

view:properties.rma:dispositionInstructions: Cutoff when superseded. Destroy immediately after cutoff

view:properties.cm:name: Foreign Employee Award Files
view:properties.cm:title: Foreign Employee Award Files
view:properties.cm:description: Decorations to foreign nationals and US citizens not employed by the US Government consisting of: case files of recommendations, decisions, awards announcements, board meeting minutes, and related documents which are maintained by any JS/combatant command activity

view:properties.rma:dispositionInstructions: Permanent. Cut off on completion of case, hold 2 years, then retire to offline storage. Transfer to federal records holding area 5 years after retirement to offline storage. Transfer to NARA 25 years after cutoff.

view:properties.rma:dispositionDescription: Transfer to federal records holding area.

view:properties.cm:name: Case Files and Papers
view:properties.cm:title: Case Files and Papers
view:properties.cm:description: Consisting of library containing information on personnel actions which are maintained by R&A Br and Deputy Chief Information Office
view:properties.rma:dispositionInstructions: Disposal not authorized. Disposition pending NARA approval.

view:properties.cm:name: Withholding of Within-Grade Increase (WGI) Records
view:properties.cm:title: Withholding of Within-Grade Increase (WGI) Records
view:properties.cm:description: Files concerning an employeeâ€™s performance rating of record with work examples which establish less than fully successful performance, notice of withholding of WGI, employee's request for reconsideration of denied WGI, and decision concerning such a reconsideration request which are maintained by any JS/combatant command activity.

view:properties.rma:dispositionSchedule: Cut off on completion of WGI action or on separation, whichever is earlier; hold 3 years, then destroy/delete.

view:properties.cm:name: Payroll Differential and Allowances
view:properties.cm:title: Payroll Differential and Allowances
view:properties.cm:description: Consisting of: information to assist overseas civilian personnel offices to document employee eligibility for foreign post differential and foreign quarters and post allowances, including SF 1190 (Foreign Allowances Application, Grant, and Report) and similar information which are maintained by any JS/combatant command activity.

view:properties.rma:dispositionInstructions: Cut off at end of Fiscal Year (FY) in which all allowances granted are terminated, hold 3 years, then destroy.

view:properties.cm:name: Miscellaneous Files
view:properties.cm:title: Miscellaneous Files
view:properties.cm:description: Record series for miscellaneous files

view:properties.cm:name: Civilian Employee Training Program Records
view:properties.cm:title: Civilian Employee Training Program Records
view:properties.cm:description: Decorations to foreign nationals and US citizens not employed by the US Government consisting of: case files of recommendations, decisions, awards announcements, board meeting minutes, and related documents which are maintained by any JS/combatant command activity

view:properties.rma:dispositionInstructions: Cut off annually, hold 5 years, then destroy, or destroy when obsolete, whichever is earlier.

rma:recordCategory.view:childName: cm:Purchase of Foreign Award Medals and Decorations

view:properties.cm:name: Purchase of Foreign Award Medals and Decorations
view:properties.cm:title: Purchase of Foreign Award Medals and Decorations
view:properties.cm:description: Forms reflecting purchase of foreign award medals and decorations.

view:properties.rma:dispositionInstructions: Cutoff when related record is transferred to inactive storage, hold 1 year, destroy.

view:properties.cm:name: Monthly Cockpit Crew Training
view:properties.cm:title: Monthly Cockpit/Crew Training
view:properties.cm:description: Consisting of skills training/evaluation forms, e.g., AF Form 4031.

view:properties.rma:dispositionInstructions: Cutoff after training is complete, hold 1 year, destroy.

view:properties.cm:name: Science Advisor Records
view:properties.cm:title: Science Advisor Records
view:properties.cm:description: Consisting of: reports, studies, tasking orders, and similar records. Reports are usually informal and unpublished. Records may be generated at all activities

view:properties.rma:dispositionInstructions: Cut off on completion of study, hold 5 years, then transfer to Inactive Storage. Transfer to NARA 25 years after cutoff.
